channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report I-2024120013
item.description:
Report I-2024120013

item.title: Report I-2024120019
item.description:
Report I-2024120019

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-13
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Water
  • Carrier/Reporter: TOTE MARITIME ALASKA, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 11/10/2024, PNEU 418010 was loaded to the vessel without a declaration of hazardous materials(glycol residue- UN 3082, Class 9). The shipper provided a BOL identifying the hazardous material, but this was sent to the incorrect email address. Per TOTE Maritime policies, hazardous materials must be declared to and approved by our Hazardous Approvals team prior to acceptance at a TOTE terminal.

  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0

  • Description: While screening items through x ray, found items that may look like potential DG. Performed physical search and found 2 tubes of flammable sealant. Removed pieces from shipment and shipped remaining items.

  • Description: During x-ray screening, I saw aerosol shape object. I conduct target physical search to confirm x-ray result. 1 aerosol can was discover in the shipment. I remove aerosol and clear the entire shipment for air transport.

item.title: Report I-2024120018
item.description:
Report I-2024120018

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-06T12:24:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-03
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Water
  • Carrier/Reporter: TOTE MARITIME ALASKA, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On November 3,2024, TAG inspected trailer LTIA 253701, booking SEA 1070024. This load sailed NB on the Midnight Sun Voyage 24173 that departed Tacoma on 10/31/2024. Upon inspecting it, TAG found undeclared hazardous items of 5 boxes of UN2037 Gas Cartridges Receptacle, Small, Containing Gas labeled Flammable Gas 2.1. The trailer was placarded correctly as there were other 2.1 products inside that were non-limited quantity items. This item was not manifested or submitted for approval and the trailer sailed with undeclared hazardous material inside on the Vessel.
